name: Vizzy & The Lost Cat
description:
Made of the Mobile Game Jam 2022 (Hosted by the sexy cat Stepford!)

The Theme is "Lots of them"

In this game.. Lots of what??? LOTS OF MONEY!!!!!!!

This game is a vertical platformer shooter where you play as the title role "Vizzy" who helps other people out with their problems. Even if she doesn't achieve the desired outcome from her clients. She finds a missing poster for a cat named "Tim Fulp" and decides to find em' in a tower.

The game overall is E+ but Marv says ass in this game so it gets a mild text rating!

|| CONTROLS ||

Arrow Keys to Move around

Z to Jump

X to Shoot

ESC to Pause

M to Mute

|| MOBILE ||

The Mobile Controls will be displayed on the screen

|| GAMEPAD ||

D-Pad to Move around

= CREDITS =

Just-a-ng-dummy : Artwork, Code, and Design

DemisurgeX : Music

MarvelousToastBrand : Additional Artwork

Special Thanks to Peti for doing sum Playtesting
